item.title: Google CTF 2020 teleport Chromium sandbox escape
item.description: Teleport Please write a full-chain exploit for Chrome. The flag is at /home/user/flag. Maybe there’s some way to teleit out of there? 1. Story Hi, last week I participated in Google CTF 2020 with my team pwnPHOfun Although I didn’t solve the challenge in time for the points; still, here is a writeup for the challenge teleport for you. I like to write detailed articles that are understandable and replicable to my past self.

item.title: RITSEC18 Freeze
item.description: It’s clearly a python compiled program since there is a libpython and also, when using decompiler, there was a function name PyDontWriteByteCode using ‘pyi-archive-viewer’ we can extract the main function. Append headers to the file "\x03\xf3\x0d\x0a\xf1\x32\x75\x5a" using uncompyle, we can get the main function. Change the key a little bit Â±k*360 and we will get the flag.
